about_the_game:
This game will immerse you in a wonderful stylized beach somewhere in the outskirts of the hot countries of our Planet.
A pleasant anime atmosphere, light drinks, beautiful girls and yellow sand - that's what awaits our character, changing day and night!

During the day you are left to your own devices, on a crowded beach with gorgeous girls.
Foam parties await you at night.


Have you ever wanted to shoot the whole beach with a water weapon?
This entertainment always goes hand in hand with fun, heat and a great beach.
This girl Lady "Watergun" is gathering a team to participate in a water battle, be aware and enlist her support...
And maybe you will be the future champion of the beach!


Even in such a heavenly place, there are those who decide everything in the “underground”.
They have completely different principles and ideas. "Lady Junk" is one of them... she will guide you
and teach a lot of unusual things in this world and immerse you in the relationships of different factions.


Especially for you, this girl is going to organize epic races on the beach and competitions with radio-controlled cars.
Think you are the best racer!? You enter the turn perfectly!? Masterfully control the joystick!? - So prove it...
Speed ​​competitions, rallies and free roam are all waiting for you when Keiko prepares tournaments and competitions for you!


Business has always been a part of life, including beach holidays.
This dude rose from the bottom and set up his shop in the most cereal place. Who is this Taehyung Kun!?
Just get adventurous or his connection with other more powerful people will do well for his cause.

During the day you are left to your own devices, on a crowded beach with gorgeous girls.
Foam parties await you at night.


What kind of beach does without bars, restaurants and barmaids...
Loona Tarhoon is at your service, she is who sees everything that happens and what condition the bar visitors are in.
She pours lemonade and prepares cocktails. But do not try to buy something alcoholic from her if you are under 18 years old.



Your phone has a social network in which you maintain your blog dedicated to your adventures among beautiful girls. Subscribers to your blog will send tasks, the completion of which will increase your blog.


Take pictures of girls and surroundings with your phone - just shoot of whatever you want, or specific places, maybe pretty girls!
Post pictures on your blog and get new likes them... More good pictures - more blog activity!


Communicate with girls - get to know them, make choices in communication and expect the consequences.
Try to win over the girls, make them angry or find out her story... Every girl on the beach has her own life, history and hobbies.
Chat with them and maybe you are lucky to find out her phone number, make friends or become enemies, and maybe even start a relationship!

But be careful - because you as a guy, are not a welcome guest on this beach!


As you stay on the beach, and as visitors become dissatisfied with your stay, you run the risk of finding yourself in a situation where everyone will try to kick you out of this place.
Lifeguards will come to the aid of beach girls, who will throw you out of this place without any caresses.


If you are tired of shooting photos and communication, there are always got a mini games at your disposal that, you can immerse yourself in on this beach ... play the piano, control cars (with remote control), draw on the board and so...


Good luck and good weather!

content_descriptors.notes: “This game may not be suitable for all ages. This game contains strong language, adult themes and content include nudity(naked bodies) and mild violence.”

name: JB Hunter: Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-4300 (or similar)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1630 (or similar)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: We play as blogger JB. He came in pursuit of his girlfriend to this paradise island. But he was drawn into an adventure between the inhabitants of the island.
